summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Vox OS personal AI assistant app. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Chat with GPT-5.1, briefings, calendar, tasks, and memory features all operational.
passed_tests: Chat with Vox AI using GPT-5.1 - message sending and response generation
Calendar events CRUD operations (get, create, delete)
Tasks CRUD operations (get, create, update status, delete)
Frontend VOX OS dashboard loading with proper title
Chat interface - typing and sending messages
Tasks panel - adding new tasks and toggling completion
Dark theme with neon/glow effects implementation
Responsive design and proper data-testid attributes
